ticket.title: RFC-0028 REQ-0007 disclosure-control interlock and trade-secret policy enforcement

tickets.reason: Disclosure policy interlock depends on boundary-flow and declassification receipt enforcement.

in_scope: Bind authoritative effects to signed disclosure-control policy snapshots and active policy epochs.
Deny patent/provisional and unapproved disclosure channels in `TRADE_SECRET_ONLY` mode with structured defects.
Fail closed on unknown, stale, missing, or ambiguous disclosure-control state.
out_of_scope: Design of future patent-allowing governance policy modes.

steps: Wire trade-secret policy profile checks into gate evaluation path.
Add policy-epoch signature/freshness verification and phase-mode matching checks.
Implement structured deny traces for prohibited disclosure channels.
Add policy transition negative tests for unsigned or stale transitions.

criteria: Policy mode hash and epoch are digest-bound to promotion-critical decisions.
Trade-secret mode rejects patent/provisional workflows by default.

notes.security: Disclosure-control posture changes never relax containment guarantees.
notes.verification: Include phase-mode mismatch, stale policy, and unsigned transition deny fixtures.
notes.general: This ticket operationalizes RFC-0028 disclosure controls as hard admission constraints.
